title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - The biggest upset of the year
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - The biggest upset of the year
description:
Canelo goes down, and Bivol remains undefeated. Dmitry Bivol took down Canelo Alvarez by unanimous decision and Chris and Sergio are here to give their instant reaction to the fight. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
